binding:binding.name: PioneerAvr Binding
binding:binding.description: A binding for Pioneer AVRs. Compatible models: SC-57, SC-LX85, SC-55, SC-1526, SC-LX75, VSX-53, VSX-1326, VSX-LX55, VSX-2021, VSA-LX55, VSX-52, VSX-1126, VSX-1121, VSX-51, VSX-1021, VSX-1026, VSA-1021, VSX-50, VSX-926, VSX-921, VSA-921. Other models may work with some odd behaviors.
binding:binding.author: Antoine Besnard
